ygData.subject: Shadow silk armor?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I was reading about this shadow armor stuff.  i believe i read that it is.   1 shadow wolf pelt, 1 silk swatch, and 1 gather shadows scroll (an
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,
I was reading about this shadow armor stuff. i believe i read that it
is. 1 shadow wolf pelt, 1 silk swatch, and 1 gather shadows scroll (an
extra one to make inkie shadow silk) has anyone tried this? it didn't
say anything about patterns or different quantities. so i was wondering
about the amount of silk. is it like making raw silk armor (ie: 2 silk for
tunic, 1 for gorget?) or does this all combine to make like a shadow silk
swatch or sumthin.

thanx in advance

Jim
